news.title: Latest news
news.description: Stay updated with the latest insights, tips, and trends in our curated collection of articles. Our experts share valuable knowledge to help you navigate through various topics, inspiring creativity and innovation along the way.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.minLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

success.Registered: Registration successful. Please check your email for the password to access the platform.
success.PasswordRecovery: An email with the password recovery code has been sent. Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
success.PasswordReset: Password reset successful. Please log in to continue.

warning.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this page.

home.title: Welcome to
home.description: Find solutions, share knowledge, and connect with experts in debugging!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.descriptionEmail: Enter your email address to receive a verification link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descriptionCode: Enter the verification code sent to your email and set a new password.
forgotPassword.descriptionConfirm: Your password has been changed. You can now log in with your new password.
